alert.note: Alert for Cambria; Somerset (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 8:16PM EST until January 22 at 11:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. A light glaze of ice is expected on the ridgetops this evening, with rain in the valleys. * WHERE...Cambria and Somerset Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Untreated surfaces over the higher elevations could be slippery. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed precipitation will change to light snow late tonight, with accumulations Monday of less than an inch in most locations.
info.instruction: The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Call 5 1 1 or visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and traffic conditions. To report snow or ice, post to the NWS State College Facebook page, use Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or visit weather.gov/ctp.
